snippet: The New Orleans police superintendent said that a suspect had been arrested and faced a first-degree murder charge in a Bourbon Street gunfight that left a woman dead and nine people wounded.
lead_paragraph: The New Orleans police superintendent said that a suspect had been arrested and faced a first-degree murder charge in a Bourbon Street gunfight that left a woman dead and nine people wounded.

headline.main: Louisiana: Arrest Made in New Orleans Gunfight
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Arrest Made In New Orleans Gunfight
